title: MCnotes kickoff: modular dev updates
summary: Baseline project structure, post blocks, dark-mode tokens, and Ctrl/⌘K search.
author: Sneizzle

blocks.title: Design goals
blocks.body: Every update should read like a product changelog: clear hierarchy, scannable cards, and timeline-first structure.

items.title: Repo bootstrapped
items.body: React + Vite + Pages deploy on main.

items.title: Dark mode tokens
items.body: Native-feeling dark mode with CSS variables + color-scheme.

cards.title: Blocks not blobs
cards.body: Posts are structured blocks (timeline/cards/code/callouts) so every post stays consistent.

cards.title: Fast discovery
cards.body: Search indexes title, summary, tags at build-time to keep initial JS small.

cards.title: Performance targets
cards.body: Route splitting + lazy search keeps initial load lean and interactions snappy.

cards.title: GitHub Pages ready
cards.body: Configured base path /Blogside/ and BrowserRouter basename.
